description: This file defines the main page component for the web interface of the 'Unified Connector' application, which manages integrations with third-party services like Jira and Confluence. It includes UI elements such as dashboard sections, connection management buttons, OAuth configuration forms, and actions related to these connectors.

methods.name: OAuthButton
methods.description: Initiates OAuth login flow for specified connector (jira or confluence).

methods.name: CreateJiraIssueButton
methods.description: Creates a Jira issue with user-provided summary and project key.

methods.name: Field
methods.description: A labeled input field component for forms.

methods.name: OAuthConfigBlock
methods.description: Component for configuring OAuth client settings for a connector.

methods.name: CreateConfluencePageButton
methods.description: Creates a Confluence page with user-specified space key and title.
